Package com.koucha.experimentalgame.entity

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Component
    Component that can be added to an Entity
    Controller
    Controller provide instructions to Entity objects
    Mesh
    Holds 3D data in a format that can be rendered by a Renderer
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Camera
    Camera for viewing 3D scenery The Camera looks at its position from the point (position + offset)
    Entity
    Entity containing all its components
    PlayerController
    Receives mouse and keyboard input and generates instructions for the player Entity
    Position
    Represents the position, orientation and velocity of an Entity
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PlayerController.Selector
    Associates actions to flags of a bit mask
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
